thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 27 of 1307
thread.title: Lynda S.
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Lynda S.

author: Lynda S.
title: Lynda S.
text:
I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to get a tire without an appointment. My tire had a screw in it and had gone flat. I was able to put air in it, but needed it replaced right away.
Pascoe was very helpful and friendly and didn't make me feel pressured or uncomfortable as a walk in. The cost was fair and the time it took was agreeable. I was in and out a lot faster than I anticipated. I WILL be purchasing all my tires from there from now on. Thanks for the help.
